meanings.sent1: She was the breathiest singer in the choir.
meanings.sent2: The marathon runner was known for his breathiest performance.
meanings.sent3: The penguin tried to be the breathiest swimmer in the icy waters.
meanings.sent4: His breathiest voice filled the room with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The mountain air was the breathiest he had ever experienced.
